text: Tribal Tech is the fourth album by the jazz fusion band Tribal Tech, released in 1991. ==Track listing== # "Signal Path" (Scott Henderson) – 6:26 # "Big Girl Blues" (Scott Henderson) – 6:15 # "Dense Dance"(Gary Willis, Scott Willis) – 4:51 # "Got Tuh B"(Gary Willis, Scott Willis) – 6:43 # "Peru" (Scott Henderson) – 7:23 # "Elvis At The Hop" (Scott Henderson) – 4:34 # "The Necessary Blonde" (Gary Willis, Scott Willis) – 6:52 # "Fight The Giant" (David Goldblatt) – 4:05 # "Sub Aqua" (Scott Henderson) – 5:30 # "Formula One" (Scott Henderson) – 4:44 # "Wasteland" (Gary Willis) – 8:03 ==Personnel== *Scott Henderson - guitar, guitar synthesizer *Gary Willis - bass, synthesizers *David Goldblatt - keyboards *Joey Heredia - drums *Brad Dutz - percussion ==References== Category:1991 albums Category:Tribal Tech albums Category:Relativity Records albums
title: Tribal Tech (album)
